data.text: The whole experience of using the app if fine and much better than the web interface. Coin collection is a nice feature. Search customizations are not adequate and too many things to click on. Sometimes not enough spec on the product while they are available on other platforms. The app should be streamlined in a better way. One thing I hated the most is the ad or notification that pop up when you open the app. Over all, would you use it again and continue purchasing from Ali Express.
data.replyText: Thanks for your feedback. We're always trying to improve our app so that you can have the best experience. We'll take your concerns into consideration, and if you have any other questions or feedback, please visit our Help Center: https://so.aliexpress.com/s/ByrCmn?

data.text: Everything I have ordered has came as described. Be careful of pricing, some things are showing photos of larger items with low prices. For example: Click on a large tent that is listed as $12 dollars and find out that is the price for the tent stakes ONLY. THEN once you have been drawn in the price of the actual TENT will be .....say...$260. If your looking for cheaper options for some items this would be my go to app. I have ordered over a dozen items. Shipping could take weeks.

Our experience is merchant after merchant...that fails to deliver. They use various tactics to lying about shipping info, reroute shipments, screw up tracking numbers, report after a week they don't have inventory, and more. Illegal listings, where they show a main image, describe it accurately in the title, and show a price. BUT go into listing to buy or put in cart and they suddenly show other items to pick from, where the other items are the price listed and jack up the price on main item.

Mobile app is easier to use than the desktop version, because the site opens a window for every product you view, which makes it difficult to navigate. As for the shop, I've purchased several items, and shipping can vary from early, on time and late. I've select products from seller's that have detailed product information as well as plenty of details about the company.

App is just the website: usually misleading, different prices than the item shown. Items not packed, just thrown in a baggie, so most items arrive damaged. That is, if it arrives at all. Ali requires proof that an item was not delivered. After many attempts, they asked I provide a letter on official stationary from the carrier. Local tracking only refers you to the Chinese sender which has no customer service access. So even though items are cheap, you don't always get what you paid for.

Items are very good and also awesome prices. Delivery is right on point, the only thing I don't like is when it comes to items arriving damaged,the app makes it difficult,by getting stuck on same page and not letting you pass to the next step after reporting and sending pics of damage merchandise. You guys are great, don't get me wrong,but don't start f***ING up. Also items in package come all beat up and bunched up. Fragile items should come in boxes,not plastic bags.

Been using this site for years, but the recent UI update is terrible. There isn't a section on each item for reviews anymore and they've removed the number showing how many of an item is left when in your cart on low stock items instead showing "Almost sold out". Meaning you need to go to the store page for any useful information. It's very obvious they've decided it's more important to rush people to buy then have them make well informed decisions when purchasing.

Overall great and fun. I wish there was a way to automatically filter out items that can't ship to my address for whatever reason - it's annoying to find the perfect thing at the perfect price, only to be told "The product can't be shipped to your region", especially when another option in the listing can be shipped. I know most items have it listed somewhere, but it's easily missed. Please just filter them out rather than waste my time. Otherwise great.

I'm new to aliexpress and I like a lot of the various items offered. My big issue, big enough to give up and delete the app, is all the issues I've had with payment, and therefore getting orders to go through. I've had to cancel 15 or more orders simply because I couldn't get payment to go through. Cards, prepaid cards, PayPal, Ive tried a bunch of options, none work consistently.

Hard not to admire... or get a bit addicted to the deals that can be had. But, buyer beware, all kinds of trickery or forgeries abound. And, hard to decipher what you're ordering versus the images, descriptions, and headlines of the item tickling your fancy. I've gotten some truly awesome deals... and mind-blowing junk I wouldn't have paid one red cent for, not the 3 bucks I shelled out (and then waited three weeks to maximize the eventual disappointment). Take your time, explore, wait, enjoy!

The items are usually good, sometime hit or miss. The shipping varies from halfway decent to horrible. The app is okay honestly. UPDATE: Dont download this, the returns are terrible. They seller literally has all the power, aliexpress confirmed it. The sellers dont have to provide anything when you return something, so if they want to rip you off, they will. I was stolen from and message 5 times and was denied a refund even though i gave proof i sent the items back. I'm furious

Nearly all the things are as pictured the prices as great, just make sure to check and see if there's any shipping fees, and remember even if the shipping fee is $2 it's $2 per item so it can add up also somethings take a lot longer to ship than others but if you're not in a hurry it's fine. I wouldn't buy clothes from here though I've tried a few times 😅 never any good

Very very very user-UNfriendly. For a long time I thought I had double/triple ordered, most products are 100% as described, I hope AliExpress improves the ordering part of the app if they want repeated business. Remove unclear options to eliminate double/triple ordering. Also, give the option to select more than one type/color/size of the same product/order. I assure you your business will increase if you implement the above suggestions. Thank you.

After many yrs shopping wkly they offered a VIP service, I signed up for 30 day free trial. NOT WORTH IT! So I've beem trying to cancel it b4 the $20yrly charge. There is no way to contact a live person anywhere anymore, Just a bot with very few options so.I picked every scenario possible to the end, Nothing leads to a live agent on app or website. Nor lets you cancel tho it says to click the bottom of VIP info page. It's a plain box. Now Im charged $$ Site is now just another scammers haven.

Deceptive Practices with this Company: Beware of price increases in your cart. Bait & Switch from Day 1. Also, clicking on an item of interest from the main page will show a low price. Only for the buyer to find out that the seller has listed multiple items in the same lot-and the pictured item of interest is really 3X as much! Editing as I made a purchase and "somehow" I don't have changing prices in my cart anymore. However, I still see wrong prices listed on ads w/multiple items.

I finally tried AliExpress after years of hearing about it. I'm shocked how poorly the app and website work. Everything is extremely difficult. I put in one large order and they made me pay 17 different times reentering my payment info each time. A different charge for each seller. My credit card got cancelled by my bank because they suspected fraud. Now, they give me an error when I try to track packages or view order details. No resolution from customer service. What a waste of time and money!
data.replyText: Dear customer, we're sorry for the unpleasant experience about payment process. Should you require any additional support, please do not hesitate to visit our website (https://so.aliexpress.com/s/ByrCmn?) to reach out customer service for further assistance at your convenience. We appreciate the opportunity to assist you. Sincerely, AliExpress Team

data.text: Some items show up fine ,others are really cheap look alike junk,or they don't show up and you literally have to fight to get your money back through their "return system" or you only get part of your money back,or they don't address packages correctly so they get stuck lost in transit, ALIEXPRESS sides with the sellers more often than not even when you provide evidence of undelivered packages...at first it wasn't bad except for long wait time,now it seems like more a big SCAM,BEWARE
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced. Providing an exceptional shopping experience and ensuring the customer's satisfaction is our top priority. We’ll take your proposal back internally for careful evaluation and be continuously improving our product and service.

data.text: App completely nonfunctional now. When browsing a listing, it will randomly take you to homepage & lose what you were looking at or about to click in suggestions. I've been "refunded" on several orders only to never see the $ in my bank, this is in addition to insane wait times after the seller doesn't ship for up to a month. If you don't request in their tiny window, you won't get a refund. Shipping is expensive. Can't combine from same seller even though shipping to US is cents for China.
data.replyText: Dear customer, we apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced. Providing an exceptional shopping experience and ensuring the customer's satisfaction is our top priority. Should you require any support, you can visit our help center for further help at your convenience, we will help you as much as we can. Best wishes, AliExpress Team

data.text: Bad wishlist. AliExpress limits their wishlist, where amazon has no limit. Plus you can't just add into another wishlist cause it doesn't work. Needs to be fixed and very unacceptable. When you try to save something it goes straight to the main wishlist. It is like you can't pick any other wishlist. You have to manually add to another. I don't think it will ever get fixed.
data.replyText:
Dear customer, thank you for sharing your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced. Providing an exceptional shopping experience and ensuring the customer's satisfaction is our top priority. We’ll take your proposal back internally for careful evaluation and be continuously improving our product.
Best wishes,
AliExpress Team

data.text: Not always easy to navigate. Account buttons are not available once you start browsing items. When you've done a search or buy something, their algorithm hyper-fixates on the same types of items over and over again forever. Yes, I bought a smart watch from AliExpress. It doesn't mean I want to keep buying smartwatches. Show me other stuff.

my top shop app.. their are no ads other then the Aliexpress ads . I have been shopping on Aliexpress and I've never had any major problems and if I did it's resolved quickly their are some small issues with little items but I'm not wasting my time on 1.99 or 1.00 when I'm already receiving a major deal as is.. over all this app is 5 stars plus for me

The app takes some getting used to. The different shopping carts in different levels of items/price are new to me. There are some good deals to be found here but sometimes Amazon has as good or better prices with 2 day shipping, super easy and free returns if necessary. You just have to shop around. If you need to do a return "file a dispute" it can be very time consuming and stressful.

I've been using the app for years, but I'm just now having an issue out of them. A package is stuck with no updates and no useful tracking, I opened a dispute once already, and it was denied. It's been over a week, and I've opened another. It was only $22, but it's the principal! If they make this right and either send the item or refund the item, I'll change this. I've reached out to the seller TWICE now with no response.

I ordered a item from AliExpress and they indicated that they delivered the item to my address. They provided a tracking number and date delivered. However, I never received the part. When I traced the shipment I found that the item was delivered to another address. When I tried to resolve the delivery issue with Aliexpress they indicated that the order was "complete". It was my first experience with the company. I will not place an order with them again. It's too difficult dealing with them.

The app conaists of a variety of unique independent stores so shipping and quality does vary. No matter where you're buying from ALWAYS read the small print and the reviews are vital. If you get trash you really have only yourself to blame for being a lazy shopper. I've made that mistake as well. Even on bigger shopping apps. AliExpress offers an array of clothing, jewelry, wigs, etc... that are quirky, cool, trendy and excentric that you WILL NOT find anywhere else. That's why it's my favorite.

I've been buying stuff at AliExpress for many years without any problems, but things are changing. Now I'm not receiving some orders and the store is automatically refusing all refunds without anyone reading or replying to our messages. So, it's just gambling now. You no longer know if you'll receive the item or just lose the money, with absolutely no security.

Good prices, but when it comes to shipping updates, it sucks! The app shows a date, the emails I receive show a different information and the "track my order" link takes me to the app just to see a totally different date. It even showed me my order has been delivered (which I haven't), and then the next day it shows it'll be here the next day. And hours later I get an email saying it will arrive late, and then the next message shows the original delivery date.

The worst experience I ever had is through AliExpress. I did business with them for years with no problem and all of a sudden I have to show three forms of identification to verify my credit cards every time I purchase something, but I have to wait 3 days for an answer before I can purchase anything. So I switched platforms to "TEMU"... Better products, cheaper prices, way faster delivery 🚚... 😉🥰😍. Okay Christmas season is now done and I tried my luck once again, no problem now.

Overall happy with the App. Dislike having to double and tripple check everything to figure out what kind of advertising scam there using but it's mainly bait and switch which once you figure out isn't that hard to avoid but it makes you wonder if they do that what else would they do to scam you out of your money. Because of that I limit my purchases to small items usually under $5-$10 and never more than $100 on any single item!

The return/refund/dispute process is painful. Don't buy anything expensive or that you really need to work from this app or website. Also the app is slow and difficult to navigate to such basic things as seller chat, shipping tracking, and refund status. It's easy to get to the cheesy games that are inexplicably built in though, so there's that...

Love this app!! It is the best place to find so far for me flashlights and headlamps as well as phone chargers I also bought an ocedar mop and bucket for a great deal off of here a whole lot cheaper than buying in a retail store!!! There's multiple things you can buy on this app it seems like everything runs together sometimes and if you search a certain thing sometimes it just doesn't pull it up they may have it or may not but it doesn't pull up just that thing you're looking for every time!

Was trying to do the get three for 99 cents thing and when I went to go check out it told me that all items were out of stock so I went to go pick different items and when I did that everything wasn't 99 cents no more and now everything is a dollar on up. Scam don't waste your time with this app temu is better at least it tells you when items are out of stock before you go to check out. Uninstalling never downloading again.
data.replyText:
Dear customer, thank you for feedback and your words mean so much to us. We will be continuously improving our product and look forward to impress you. We are grateful for the opportunity to regain your confidence.
Sincerely,
AliExpress Team

data.text: Tons of bait and click low prices. I order a lot of stuff from this app and do far so good. Some stuff failed or not live up to the description but that's only about 5% of the stuff I ordered. My biggest complaints. Shows you a low price thumbnail but when you click it they sell you something else random. They show you stuff you don't need like wigs. Shipping is slow. Low price but expensive shipping. Weird messy layout. Overall I'm happy just keep your expectations low.
data.replyText:
Dear customer, thanks for taking time to share your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience it may cause. Providing an exceptional shopping experience and ensuring customer's satisfaction is our top priority. We’ll take your proposal back internally for careful evaluation and be continuously improving our product.
Sincerely,
AliExpress Team

data.text: Some good bargains, but the games to play to get discounts are super glitchy. Items purchased from the store within merge boss are stuck at the top and won't drop down to the board. Every single time I click an item, the screen says "network reconnecting" and then the item reverts back to the top. This has happened repeatedly. Please advise.

Used to be great, now the prices are on par with Amazon. Just go there, there's no deals anymore and the pages are all full of false advertising, bait and switches, etc. Seems they've decided to just try to scam out as much money as they can while they still have a few buyers and Google hasn't yet dropped their links for false advertising. You can't even check your past orders anymore in the app, screen is gone.

Good app, what you lose in shipping times you make up for in prices and selection. Unlike *certain* other apps (looking at you, Wish) you can find things you want instead of just settling for the random things they throw at you. Also the shipping is slow but still twice as fast as *certain* slower competitors (where's my grapefruit slicers, Wish?)

Very confusing app hard to return an item. Have contacted seller and AliExpress can't get a response of what to do how to send back. All help screens tell you where to go but can't find the tab they show. Messages all say unread. They reply to your message with email but the links are already expired. Will never buy again they didn't send the item I ordered.

Terrible search, terrible sort, terrible UI, obtrusive ads: What more could one want?! It ignores search terms and just shows you items they want you to see. Sort options are ignored entirely. Search & sort used to work great--then one day they just nerfed them. Google now works better finding specific items on AliExpress than their own intentionally broken search! Ali's far from the only marketplace that's started doing this, but they're probably the worst offender (Amazon close behind.) Boooo

Added 5 items to my cart but cannot make a payment. Says to update billing address and when I hit "next" nothing happens. Went back to my cart and my items weren't there anymore. They're under my "unpaid" items which now I would have to pay individually for each item. I'm not wasting my time with that. No wonder Temu is becoming more popular.

A word of caution! Be careful for what you order. A lot of the pictures are very misleading. Out of a $100 purchase, I am return $80 worth. Be weary of the sellers and be sure they have a decent rating before buying from them. TEMU is a lot more reliable and faster in shipping products; however, they don't have the items I want such as the collectible toys

This app is easy to use and find so many items. You get notification when discount. The only problem is when the seller sent you the wrong item Aliexpress does not take buyer side. Always take seller side and you will lost all your money. Two times it happenes to me and lost my money so sad about that. Aliexpress does not care about their customers. They have to change that and satisfied customers

24/02/2024 - Easy shopping experience and I was able to make payment with my virtual card. 19/10/2020-Previously, I enjoyed using the app but now, it's like a total waste of time. I can't pay for my goods with any of my cards cos it keeps saying failed transaction even with cards that I used earlier. I hear there's a paystack option for payment but I don't have the option on my app.

So far so good... Well I had to change from 4 stars to 5. I've been happy with everything I've purchased, the prices are amazing, and my orders have been on time every time. No crazy long waiting time for delivery either. If it says 11 days to get to you that's exactly how long it takes. The only thing I would change is how many coins I could use to purchase a product. Like if I could pay for the entire item/s with only the coins I've accumulated. I like free stuff, what can I say😉. 😁👍

I'm really disappointed with this marketplace. As a new member they deceive you with these flashy low prices but the low prices are just a plug to get you to sign up for their membership. They offer a free trial for the membership, and I was getting ready to sign up for it, BUT after reading the fine print it states they charge you the full price of the membership before the trial ends, AND if you want to cancel you'll get a refund in the form of a coupon.

Very happy with the app. Saves you money, if you don't mind waiting for it. Edit: reducing to two stars because when sending messages through the app, it is impossible to find a modified picture, like the one that marks what is wrong with the product or part of it, and the message center is impossible to find. 2nd Edit: down to 1 star as it consumes tons of data. If you have a limited data allowance, it will use it all very quickly, especially if you have a quick connection.

If you order anything, the "tracking" functionality is essentially useless. In some cases, the app provides inconsistent information, e.g., the line graph shows it has not yet reached customs, while the text indicates it has departed customs. Forget about reaching out for help. The chat feature is automated and is similarly useless as it does not seem to consider user input when providing its reply. This is based on my first order of several items, and there is no good news yet.

1. It's hard sorting items by price, including delivery. The delivery price can be x2 than the item price, but the sorting feature doesn't care. 2. The picture of the item and the price don't match when I search. When I click there, it can be just a box of the item for this price. 3. When I start the application,I see advertisements for several seconds. that's terrible 4. Free delivery tick doest work well, it shows "free from xxx dollars", I don't want spent more, why you show it's free then?

I've never had a major issue with anything I've bought from here... One item has been faulty, but it was only cheap so no great loss. App is easy to use and I have spent too much time and money because of it!!😀 Used the app to buy a couple of higher priced items, and no issues. Sellers are in touch if there are delays... Of course there's going to be rubbish on an app like this, but soft through and you might just find the diamonds in the rough.

The app is cluttered and annoying with promos and notifications. It's super slow. If you want me to spend money make it faster and show me the whole price for the item displayed not some stupid part of it. Show the totals with shipping.. not 30c for the item and $250 shipping.. and the savings with coins? The items with savings are more expensive than the same items without coins.. it's 99% off but it's 20% more than the same item from another seller!

Totally unimpressed with the latest version of Merge Boss. Expected improvements, got a big disappointment. App is still unreasonably slow and crashes consistently. The so called "fairer" changes to the March Millionnaire Challenge favour new players and disadvantage those of us who had to climb the hard way to make the progress we have. Also thought the new levels would be available, but they are not, so that continues to add to the disadvantage. Perhaps some user consultation would help.

The app is well written and fast. However, there is no direct access to "Picks" like there is for "Cart" and it is not very explicit about some functions. Cart, Acct, etc., should be displayed on the bottom of every screen. I also have not found how to redisplay the offers that appear when we initially open the app. I feel that from the items to order screen, one should be able to go to the full item's description with all the pics, not just the summary and one pic.

Just nice app to buy on Ali. BUT it is impossible to add a screenshot at a review or at a dispute! And no choice of a folder from where to charge photo, it is always "Camera". Guys, really? We need to go to a desktop site to do that? P.S. Upped 1 star, but still no option to add a review after XX months of use. Sometimes it could be handy when the thingy breaks off after some weeks.

AliExpress mostly doesn't hold the seller or delivery team accountable if they deliver to wrong address or package is missing but the status is "delivered". Ask them to take pic when a delivery is completed, simple. Now it's even worse, i cannot see the tracking info like last time, it just shows that the package is shipped and that's all. No details about the location and status of delivery. Why would you change something with no problem to create more problem. Please return that feature!

AliExpress is fast losing it! It's so unbelievable that the prices of items now in AliExpress (in China where almost all things are manufactured), even as bad as the Nigeria condition is, are very much higher than in our local markets 😰😰😰! Moreover, no categories and search function doesn't work correctly: meaning you're restricted to see only the products you're shown. AliExpress, What's going on or am I using the fake app?

I really like aliexpress. I will always shop, order, purchase, view, and choose with Aliexpress. The only problem is that it takes too long to arrive in my country. Sometimes, the item is small . It's OK. The next time you order, you choose, you purchase you verify the item very well. Choose the size well and the colour. Thank you, Aliexpress 😊. I will order again. I'm just waiting for all my orders to arrive in my country first. I want so many things to purchase. Thank you again.

Only positive thing about it are the prices. The storefront is the worst in the world, you have to fight it to find what you're looking for, it keeps giving you false search results. And then half the things you order are fake or lower quality or never arrive. And then you cant get all the problem items refunded, they'll refuse refunds for items that never arrive because you "didnt provide sufficient evidence", when there's no tracking number to search. So you often end up losing money overall.

On my phone all is well, content takes up the right amount of screen space and nothing is cut off, nor scaled incorrectly. On the other hand, the tablet just looks horrible; the items take up too much screen space, and many elements such as the search filters are off-screen. Better off just going with the website on a browser at that point; not that big of a deal with synchronized log-ins but still, the app is not a great experience on bigger screens.

Apart from the many popups and the freaking annoying notifications about promotions from sellers, the suggested products etc, the app or maybe the company seems like they try to mislead buyers. Although some reviews can state flaws of products, the rating always seems to be 5 stars. I left a review of 3 stars, but what is published is a 5 star. On top of that, the app doesn't let me to browse different folders to attach an image to the seller.

Don't use their services!!! They used to be really great, but now when you order something and the seller sends the wrong items ( it doesn't matter if it $2 or $80) they won't provide a refund as long as you get something. I ordered a replacement screen that cost me $80 and the seller sent me one from a totally different product, even though the listing clearly said it was for the unit I had. Even with pictures showing it was totally the wrong size, AliExpress refused to do anything. Stay Away!!

The app feels like quickly programmed with a lot of whistles and bells to boost sales. Normally, you will be charged 10% tax but they may decide to charge you 17% or even 20%. Reinstalling the app may help, if you are over-taxed. Watch out for misleading or wrong descrptions. False descriptions can often be spotted when they are inconsistent or technically not possible. Beware, super economic shipping may never arrive.

The app is easy to use, when it comes to finding and purchasing things. A annoying thing are deceiving click baits (once you click on an ad, the prices are jacked up in the listing shipping is unrealistically high or the price first seen is for a different item!). Electronics are sometimes published with wrong specs! Today, I was expected to send back a sweater to China. It was send anyway. It was cancelled right after the purchase. The shipping cost exceeds the value of the sweater by far!!!

It's nice to shop at Aliexpress because they have so many cool, useless and beautiful things and gadgets. I love it. But when you need to get hold of someone when a problem happens it's a nightmare. AI answer bots who repeat the same friendly, supportive phrases all over again. But they don't solve your problem. They lost your order but they make you look for it. Aliexpress lost 6 items I ordered all from different companies. So had to contact all of them and provide proof that my stuff's gone.

Have purchased items from here in the last few years. The recent change of shipping policies have removed certain countries from it's shipping destination list. I personally do not know the exact reason behind it but just feel a little bit unfortunate as my country (Indonesia) is not in the list. Hope to see they will bring it back in the list again in near future.

The app still needs some work. I have two shipping addresses in two different countries and I pay with two different currencies. When I change the shipping address the apps doesn't change the view of the orders so I get mixed results with the app showing the orders in one currency and the catalog in the other. I have a temporary workaround but it frustrating!!!

The app is a bit clunky and is not really device responsove. The BIGGEST gripe is if you turn notifications on to get updates on shipping, you get bombarded with promotions and offers even when you turn these notifications off. It would be useful if you could "undo" the "marked delivered" check. Due to the layout, it is easy to check the wrong one and then you are stuck.

Be careful shopping on Aliexpress. Alot of the ads description and titles are misleading. Spelling errors in the descriptions wording make it so you cannot win when trying to get a refund. When aliexpress steps in, they side with the seller. Even reviews posted in the listing make it seem as if your buying the item (it shows a picture of the box and item) but you end up receiving just the box. NO ITEM. "The Buyer" protection is a complete lie. There is no guarantee. YOU ARE NOT PROTECTED.

I love the app with the variety of product and discount in the prices. It's smooth and easy to use. But when it comes to payment, they always refer you to your card dealers, I haven't been apply to order for any product because they continually refused to accept my card payment. They should fix this issue immediately, what's the essence of having the app without being able to pay for delivery.

Had been Using that site to buy a lot . But suddenly some of the product tracking was not showing anything neither in the app nor in the qurier track. After waiting for months app showed delivery failed without any updates 😕. Asked for refund and AliExpress denied. Knocked several times in customer service but they kept chatting for hours and making it difficult. I have given all the documents that I didn't get the product. But they asking for more and more things!!! Like what the hell!!

Very bad app, as it could not allow photos to be attached properly during review. On the mobile version, all the photos are shown as question marks. While on the Tab S8+, it shows some photos but not all, so I can't attach the photos that I wanted. It seemed to be random. Note that permission to access photos has been given but problem persist. Very irritating software.

Good deals but they make you work for it! Designed to buy more than you need.... And it works Very annoying when you want to go straight to something like the status of an item you have not received. All the way down the list and it takes forever to be in the refund window even if seller is not responding. And when they respond it's obviously to waste your time and hope you forget about it for a few dollars; probably works because life is busy but it is not good customer service in the long run

The app is very comfortable to navigate. Some things that used to be cheaper are catching up with international prices and are not worth anymore to buy on AliExpress. One big complain I have is clickbait prices. Sellers put a high ticket product and a low ticket product in the same publication and make it impossible to filter or sort by price, and it is extremely annoying. The filters don't work well and don't show all the products. The reviews system is terrible you can't trust them.

There is no Option free delivery anymore. Now you need to pay 2€ delivery to get 1-2€ purchase. That's so weird. In addition, sellers are pulling off some kind of fraudulent scheme by adding several products into one, so you see photos from a more expensive product, but the price from a cheaper product.

On the one hand, I've had various problems with deliveries and bad products. On the other hand, their customer service solved them all, and I was always reimbursed. The app itself works well enough, except for the blatant false advertising of discounts (like saying a product is -60%, when it's obviously not true). That rubs me the wrong way. Overall, it's worth a try.

FREE RETURNS are not free! The return service is unreliable. Be aware of scams! Just lost $40 as 2 of my orders were sent to a random address to other side of the country, and 1 was "fake" shipped. Order was placed in January, then 2 days later it was showing DELIVERED. They simply linked it with a previous order & tracking number from November. Opened a dispute which got declined by their customer service as the tracking number showed "DELIVERED" Just stick with other apps/websites.

Used Aliexpress for years, never returned anything. The moment I decided to return an item that cost a whopping $3 the company decided to treat me like a circus animal and make me jump through so many hoops just to get a simple return going. I paid for the shipping to get the item. Now I have to pay the shipping to return the item because of a mistake on the seller's end. Yeah, that's not happening. Enjoy your 1* rating, you don't deserve anything more.

Favorite shopping easy to search and find multiple products and they also have a lot of sales throughout the year. I haven't encountered any tax or import duties on the products I've purchased. Make sure you collect the coins every day too because you can have a lot of savings by using them. The Google match game is pretty but I find they need to update it more frequently for new levels.

Excellent item browsing if you know how to search. Endless selection. Mostly very good quality. You have to be patient and hunt for the price fall of the item you care for. Plenty of information for the products for sale and many items often discounted. Speedy and easy purchasing and check out. Great delivering system. My purchases are perfect with excellent delivering times. Plus one paid item was not sent to me by the seller and it was refunded to my bank account within 3 days. Excellence.

Not bad but there are some areas which need attention. My first order was a mess since an error code appeared on payment and when I tried again I found every item ordered twice. The cancelling is not easy and so is the return . The app is not allowing me to open a dispute for the item with issue. The letters are small and very light all through the app. The buttons like SUBMIT was not even visible. Discount offers are helpful when you have to buy multiple gifts. Help center is working well.SW

Takes a bit to get used to navigating, everything is shoved into as small a space as possible. There's no smooth transition between different sections of info on a product and there's more ads thrown in than detail on products.

While I used to recommend this app to others, the customer service lately has been terrible. Items are often bundled however there have been multiple times where items were marked as part of a parcel but not included. When disputing "item not received" they ask for evidence, but what evidence can you provide that a item never arrived? And they replaced real human agents with chatbots that are unable to understand issue This has happen 3 times in the past four months. I would say buyer beware.

It is difficult to make a complaint to AliExpress or get in contact with their help centre. I have recently made an order to which I have had a message saying delivery failed. I have had no one contact me to explain why delivery has failed. For the most part, I've had a good experience with ordering from Aliexpress. However, there was one seller I ordered from, and my item did not arrive, and Aliexpress marked it as delivered. The item was never delivered, and I was unable to get a refund.

Have been using Aliexpress for 9 years, I would rate the old Aliexpress positive as new users had interesting coupons, cart was more orgnaised, any issues with delivery or product, the money was refunded.Recent time, my cart is confusing. I have the max limited in my cart and I want the items that I recently add to cart to come aligned on the top together but it always splits according to the seller. Annoying vibrating sound when I click the cart button or add items which is disturbing at night.

I have only placed one order so far, but everything was good on their end. I did receive my beautiful diamond painting. However, I had trouble on my end, my bank card didn't go through on a couple of other items that I wanted to order, not even through PayPal. Luckily the item that I wanted most, the bank card worked. I suppose the bank didn't let it go through for security reasons, transactions to a different country was giving me issues. I definitely want to order more things.

Ok. Sometimes there any too many tabs I lost where it is. When I add items to the cart and keep looking, sometimes the items added were not in the cart at some pages. I have to dig back to somewhere to find what's originally added to the cart. The coins I earned I am not sure where to use. You are allowed to use coins to purchase some items, but items in those page are much costly than normal price.

Aliexpress is basically a scam. The app glitched and messed up my address. I went through multiple chat sessions and bots to help fix an issue with a recent order. They basically just give you the run-around until guarantee refund time expires. Don't waste your time, its not worth the "savings"
data.replyText: Thank you. We're sorry to hear about your experience. If you have issues with your item, please contact the seller by tapping "Contact Seller" on the Order Detail page. If you have any more questions, please contact us at https://so.aliexpress.com/s/ByrCmn?.

data.text: I used to love AliExpress until they developed a major glitch in their system with PayPal. It no longer works. This is because after PayPal approved the payment, AliExpress says, "payment rejected." So then you have to wait a few days for your money to get kicked back by AliExpress because on PayPal's side, you've made that payment to AliExpress. Now all this money is tied up! What AliExpress even worse is that they literally have no customer service whatsoever. No human beings to talk to!👎👎👎

Postage is awful. I have never once had a single order arrive in under 6 weeks. And the tracking is abysmal. However, once the product arrives, everything I've ordered has always been decent quality and exactly as described. The app/website are also a little difficult to navigate. EDIT: just to note - for the first time ever I've just received a package within 2 weeks. Hazzah!

I filter items by free shipping, and while scrolling items it says the shipping is free, the moment I click on the item shipping changes to ridiculously expensive?? Also price baiting by showing one item on the picture with cheaper price, but when you go into the product they show that cheap stuff is something completely different, and the actual product on the picture is more expensive. They should not allow to do that and eradicate the deceiving behavior

I've been using this app store for years, I'm generally really happy with my purchases. As long as you look at the reviews and foto's you pretty much get what's on the add. They are also great at refunding it there is an issue like wrong item, size or didn't get it. Also easy to see what the actual price is as it shows the shipping costs already before putting it in your cart (this is an issue with the app Wish). Definitely recommend but don't expect top quality as that's not what you pay for.

At first it was great app but now with new update it's not. Before it had 3 from 1.99$ . There were so many items but now it's not and it shows as 3 from 4.49$ and the items are also not showing as before it shows all results has loaded like with few items. Before it had so many recommendations products but now it's not. Please fix it again back to normal

I have made multiple purchases from the app and have had great experiences. I think I may prefer the app over the website. Sure the shipping takes longer to get here, but when Amazon sometimes takes 5 days for my 2-day Prime shipping, an extra 2+ days to save some money isn't that big of a deal.

Big order multiple items.Each item had a separate seller which meant separate shipping which was worth it to me since the items were cheap. The currency was not charged in USD was euros. So far one order arrived with 2 items seems returning would be a hassle. When I went to process the order I had to try for several DAYS with multiple cards finally worked when I used a computer. My bank card flagged the purchase as fraud so far not my experience

aliexpress app advantage over its plain website us allowing you to play games like match3 or merge boss to earn coins for dicounts, and coupons in monthly events, like $1 or $2 CAD off. disadvantage is smaller screen harder to compare prices on many items, or see item details. aliexpress vendor is mostly trustworthy, over 90% of items i recieved in my mailbox or doorsteps, just some smaller items might be easily lost already, have to track or dispute with seller for refund.

Worst app I've ever used, certainly worst eshopping app. Deceptive, ever changing pricing, cart tab freaks out and unchecks items if you go to another tab, checkout tab freaks out if you exit and all the items go into a separate tab where you have to pay for each item individually, discounts appearing and dissapearing at will, horrendous user interface, must i go on? Just use temu or amazon.

They're thieves. Yes you can buy good quality items at a great price on here but... Occasionally items aren't posted to you and the shipping will show that it didn't get sent out yet the people on customer service refuse to issue refunds. They all read from the same script and promise that a refund will be issued but it never is. Incredibly frustrating because they're stealing from us poor people. If I wasn't already broke, I wouldn't be shopping on AliExpress... Anyway, do not recommend.

Aweful, Temu really does offer better services and products. I placed an order, never received it, wasnt able to get a proper support, it has been 5 weeks now and no proper attention paid. Total rip off, I am deleting the app, never to place an order here again! Very Sad that it has been years of me wanting to give it a try, and when I do i go through such an aweful experience. Temu will take it over and Ali Express will go obselete in no time!

Purchased an item and unboxed it to find it was missing. I always take videos, so I submitted a dispute to AliExpress, and despite clear video evidence, their solution was "No refund" because the seller showed an image of a scale with the weight of the item (but no video of it having been zero'd). After weeks of back and forth and telling AliExpress that Royal Mail in the UK can not be contacted by the recipient (for global deliveries), they eventually sided with me and refunded.

Aliexpress, just fix your delivery for Choice selection already! How come that a seller that ships to my country stops doing that as soon as the item hits Choice? Sometimes it's impossible to search for an item because all of them are Choice and supposedly can't be shipped to my country. It goes on for more than a year, so annoying!

AliExpress shopping app is an absolute game-changer for online shopping enthusiasts like me. With its user-friendly interface and extensive range of products, it has become my go-to app for all my shopping needs.One of the standout features of the app is its vast selection of products from various sellers around the world. Whether I'm looking for trendy fashion items, electronics, home decor, or even niche products, AliExpress has it all. The app's search function is highly efficient. Try it .

Very happy with the selection and the pricing but I do wish the descriptions were better or at least on par with the other shopping sites. Watch out for mini stuff. All in all quite happy and their prices cannot be beat.but there customer service socks. They don't stand behind you and want way ro much proof in order return small cheap inexpensive items. I usually just give up its not worth the hassles
